name: OccupationalTherapyProcedureHCPCS
title: Occupational Therapy Procedure HCPCS
purpose: (Clinical Focus: General occupational therapy procedure.),(Data Element Scope: Generic rehabilitation occupational therapy procedure that may qualify a patient for home health care  as defined by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services.),(Inclusion Criteria: General occupational therapy procedure.),(Exclusion Criteria: Rehabilitation therapy procedures generally described as physical therapy or speech-language pathology.)

concept.display: Services performed by a qualified occupational therapist in the home health or hospice setting, each 15 minutes
Services performed by a qualified occupational therapist assistant in the home health or hospice setting, each 15 minutes
Occupational therapy, in the home, per diem
